p: The fresh leaves samples (2210 and 2412 g, respectively) were collected on individual I. dewevrei trees, which were growing in different ecological conditions, in the Bossématié forest (region of Abengourou, Eastern Côte d’Ivoire, geographical coordinates: 6°26′57.9″ N and 3°28′47.5″ O) in April 2016. Plant material was authenticated by botanists from Centre Suisse de Recherches Scientifiques (CSRS) and Centre National de Floristique (CNF) Abidjan, Côte d’Ivoire. A voucher specimen was deposited at the herbarium of CNF, Abidjan, with the reference LAA 12874.
